name: Riparian Canopy Cover
functionStatement: Shade, solar input, and groundwater keep temperature and light within natural ranges for stream metabolism and dissolved oxygen.
descriptionMarkdown: Shade is sufficient for this stream type, matching historical conditions unless naturally open.
howToMeasureMarkdown: LiDAR or hemispherical photo shade percent

levels.label: Strongly Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Cleared banks and open valley floor in a historically forested setting.
Criteria: <25% shade. Note that excessive shade would be flagged only in historically open systems.

levels.label: Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Fragmented tree line with long open reaches beside pasture.
Criteria: 25-50% shade.

levels.label: Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Mixed canopy with gaps near crossings and meadows.
Criteria: 50-75% shade.

levels.label: Strongly Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Closed canopy of mature hardwoods and conifers. Continuous overchannel foliage.
Criteria: 75-100% shade where forested reference conditions are expected.
